# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeZoneSeparator.omitted

**Case**

Specifies no separator between the time and time zone in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case omitted
```

## Discussion

The `rawValue` of `omitted` is an empty string (””).

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Time Zone Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeZoneSeparator.colon**: Specifies a colon character separating the time and time zone in an ISO 8601 date format style.
